label.email-review: Please check your inbox or spam to continue....
label.email-notification: A notification will be sent to the email, Check the inbox or spam
label.unknown-error-contact-retry: Please try again later or contact the site administrator
label.verify-success-detail: Congratulations! Now you can enter the platform and learn about all our services.
label.payment-detail-desc: Save time and pay for services very easily, the products will be activated automatically
label.page-register-desc: Fill out this form to create a new account and test the features of this product that will innovate your organization.
label.terms-conditions-accept-1: I have read and accept the
label.about-our-policies-desc: Our policies and terms described in the following document contain the rules about the use of the system and the management of the data
label.login-desc: Enter our business desktop portal and continue discovering our digital tools available to grow your business
label.cmf-credits: Transformation of the updated UF according to the stock market of the Superintendence of Banks and Financial Institutions in Chile
label.support-desc: Here you can report an incident so that we can serve you more effectively, the more detailed the request, the better the response time.
label.contact-support: Your request has been alerted, we will contact you shortly to provide you with the support you need
label.name: Name
label.company-manager-desc: Manage and access the records of all companies stored in our system
label.add-company-desc: Register a company in our systems to manage it according to our services
label.detail-company-desc: Details of the company from which you can manage and update in our system
label.client-administration-desc: Create, edit and manage our clients to control access to our system
label.client-no-basic: You must save a client with a basic role.
label.app-no-grant: You must save an application with a grant role
label.email-review-to-user: Ask the user to check their inbox or spam to continue....
label.add-customer-desc: Manage members of the client, user or app type to manage access to our platform
label.user-exist: This registration already contains personal data stored in our system
label.customer-detail-desc: Review customer details and manage your data to keep our system up to date with customer information
label.contact-data-remove: Are you sure you want to delete this contact information?
label.plans-administration-desc: Manage and customize the plans of each product or service to define the prices and valid periods for each product
label.plan-not-found: The selected plan could not be loaded correctly
label.resource-updated: The selected record has been updated
label.save-confirm: Are you sure that the information provided is correct?
label.product-not-load: No product has been selected yet
label.products-administration-desc: Manage and organize the products we offer to our customers in the market
label.action-confirm: Are you sure you want to perform this action?
label.store-desc: Warehouse of products available for you. You can select the one that best suits your needs and see the prices and payment periods that best suit you.
label.product-not-found: The selected product could not be loaded
label.products-store-desc: Discover all the details of this product, its plans, prices and documents by logging in
label.products-session-store-desc: Find all the details of this product, its plans, prices and associated documentation for the purchase strategy that best suits your business or organization
label.create-company: You need to register an organization to generate the purchase
label.subscriptions-desc: This is your administration panel for the products you have subscribed to
label.my-payment-history-desc: Check the history of your payments and download the associated receipts or invoices
label.unavailable-receipt: The receipt has not yet been generated, request it from the sales team and we will generate the document shortly
label.downloading-wrong-file: The file you are trying to download contains errors, please contact the provider
label.duplicated-active-licence-action-confirm: This organization contains an active license associated with the same product, if you confirm the action the other will be deleted, check your subscriptions and wait for the previous license to expire by date, otherwise confirm to continue
label.unavailable-product: This product is no longer available
label.licences-desc: Manage the licenses of each company, filter and update the registered subscriptions
label.licence-select-a-product: Please select a product to then apply the license to an organization
label.my-profile-desc: This is your profile page. You can see the data you share in our system and manage personal information
label.customer-edit-wrong-names-or-personaldat: Wrong names to merge record or Document Data already exists in another PersonalData
label.my-organization-desc: Create or manage your own organization to access the products and services that the commercial office has for you
label.company-request-successful: The membership application process has been executed successfully, you must wait for the administrator of your organization to accept your request to return to our platform
label.customers-inactive-alert: You have pending member requests to activate or cancel, consider reviewing the inactive members of your organization
label.redirection-information: You will be redirected to our EE platform
label.plans-desc: The best prices you will find on the web for your organization
label.configuration-updated: The configuration has been updated successfully
label.configuration-desc: You can configure the public and general information of your organization, this information will be exposed as public information so that you can capture the attention of your clients and establish communication channels with them.
label.contact-desc: Contact us to obtain more information about our products and services, we will contact you shortly
label.contact-sended: Thank you for contacting us, we will review your request and respond as soon as possible.

login.title: Login
login.button-tooltip: To enter the Business Desk, remember to have your email verified
login.locked-msg: This user cannot access temporarily, contact the administrator of the site or organization.
login.recovery-invite: If you forgot your password, select recover account or register with a valid email
login.closed-msg: You have exceeded the allowed idle time
login.security-info: For security, remember to close your session at the end, in this way you will avoid the malicious use of your resources and data on our platform and you will comply with our privacy policies.
login.organization-wrong-msg: This user does not belong to the organization, please contact the organization's administrator

register.title: Register
register.haveaccount-msg: I already have my account created
register.try-again-msg: Please register or contact the site administrator
register.other-email: Register with another email or select the option recover password if you do not remember it
register.personal-data-exists: We have your information stored in our systems, for security reasons you will be able to review them when you log in.
register.personal-data-exists-without-customers: Otherwise you can select the option
register.personal-data-overwrite-info: Enter all the data from scratch to update them in the system
register.create-user-info: Create a new user by entering an email and creating a password
register.register-verify-msg: Congratulations! You are one step away from finishing, after pressing the button your user will be created so you can enter the platform
register.confirm-email-question: Do you want to confirm the email from MAIL_VALUE?
register.try-in-ee-msg: Try this operation on Business Desktop

validations.invalid-email: You must enter a valid email
validations.invalid-pwd: You must enter a valid password (At least 8 characters long and must contain letters and numbers)
validations.notsame-pwd: The passwords entered must be the same
validations.invalid-field: The data entered contains invalid characters
validations.email-used: The email entered is already in use
validations.purchase-up-to-date: The purchase order is already up to date
validations.purchase-expired: The license is expired, buy a new one to continue
validations.purchase-error-currency: The operation cannot be carried out for this type of currency
validations.customer-not-allowed: You are not allowed to view this page
validations.filters-exceed: Exceed the maximum number of filters
validations.wrong-privilege: You do not have privileges to perform this action
validations.files-exceed: The file size exceeds what is allowed
validations.invalid-pdf-type: You must upload a file in PDF format
validations.minlength: The characters entered are too few
validations.emailinactive-inproduct: User not registered in this product
validations.licenceinactive-inproduct: The client has no active licenses

password-update.title: Update Password
password-update.instructions: Hi {{ name }}, you must create a new secure password of at least 8 characters and must also contain letters and numbers
